alert.note: Alert for Eastern Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 1:19PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Union and Richmond Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 118 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Linden, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Linden, Todt Hill, Port Richmond and New Dorp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. A flood advisory is also in effect for this storm. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
